article.title: Critical Solutions to Provide Mine Detector Vehicle
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Critical Solutions International Incorporated, Carrolton, Texas, was awarded a firm-fixed-price, sole-source contract with a maximum $10,767,795 for Husky Vehicle Mounted Mine Detector Vehicle. Other location of performance is South Africa. Using service is U.S. Army. The Defense Logistics Agency Land - Warren, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
